label: Telegram to Isaiah Bennett from Sister Maria Murphy
description: Telegram to Isaiah Bennett from Sister Maria Murphy, administrator at St. Francis Xavier Hospital, in reply to1969-03-24 telegram from Bennett.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
121P EST MAR 27 69 AB088
 A CNA164 SA PDF CHARLESTON SOCAR 27 115P EST 
ISIAH [ISAIAH] BENNETT, AREA DIRECTOR NATIONAL ORGANIZING COMMITTEE
655 EAST BAY ST CHARLESTON SOCAR
WE ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT OF YOUR TELEGRAM OF MARCH 24 1969. REPLY
WAS DELAYED UNTIL OUR BOARD CHAIRMAN RETURNED TO CONVENE A
POLICY MEETING WITH OUR LEGAL COUNCIL THIS MORNING. WE ARE
MOST ANXIOUS TO PROVIDE FAIRNESS AND JUSTICE IN THE CHRISTIAN
SPIRIT TO ALL EMPLOYEES. WE FEEL THAT OUR POLICIES WHICH APPLY
TO EMPLOYEES BEARS THIS OUT. WE DO NOT FEEL THAT YOUR LOCAL
REPRESENTS THE MAJORITY OF GUR EMPLOYEES. WE WILL BE HAPPY
TO DISCUSS MATTERS OUTLINED IN YOUR TELEGRAM WITH YOU. IN CONFERENCE
WITH MOST REVEREND BISHOP UNTERKOEFLER
SISTER MARIA ADMINISTRATOR ST FRANCIS XAVIER HOSPITAL
(121 ).
